# Git Cheatsheet

## Updating local branches
- `git pull --rebase origin master` Pull and rebase
- `git fetch origin master:master` Update local master without checking out
- `git pull --rebase=interactive origin master` Squash and rebase
- `git rebase -i remotes/master` Maybe the same as above. check this.
- `git pull --rebase=interactive --autostash origin master` Stash unstaged work, rebase, unstash

## Branch naming
- `git branch -m new-name` Rename current local branch
- `git branch -m old-name new-name` Rename local branch
- `git push origin :old-name new-name` Delete the old-name remote branch and push the new-name local branch
- `git push origin -u new-name` Reset the upstream branch for the new-name local branch

## Setting the upstream
- `git remote set-url origin git@github.com:username/repo.git` Set upstream to use ssh
